prompt: Deadpan corporate technical diagram, clean vector lines, subtle shadows, off-white background, muted slate + graphite with cyan and safety orange accents. Big central diagram, consistent title placement top-left. Only include the exact text specified. No other text or numbers. Title text in top-left: 'Input vs output'. Diagram: A single request strip: input tokens have small cost squares, output tokens have larger cost squares. Labels 'input' and 'output'. Only text: 'Input vs output', 'input', 'output'.
rubric: The slide uses a clean, technical diagram style with deadpan humor.
Title text reads exactly 'Input vs output'.
No extra text appears beyond the specified labels.
Input and output segments are labeled.
Output segment shows higher cost visually.

improvements: Deadpan humor aspect is somewhat subtle; consider a slightly more exaggerated size contrast or a faintly ironic visual cue to more clearly convey the humorous intent while keeping the corporate feel.
grade.summary: All rubric items are satisfied: clean technical style with subtle shadows, correct title 'Input vs output' in the top-left, only the specified text appears, both input and output segments are clearly labeled, and the output segment visually shows higher cost through larger squares.
